definitions.definition: Any of a class of non- inflecting words and multiword terms typically employed to connect a following noun or a pronoun , in an adjectival or adverbial sense, with some other word: a particle used with a noun or pronoun (in English always in the objective case) to make a phrase limiting some other word.
A proposition ; an exposition ; a discourse .

main_definition: ( grammar , strict sense ) Any of a class of non- inflecting words and multiword terms typically employed to connect a following noun or a pronoun , in an adjectival or adverbial sense, with some other word: a particle used with a noun or pronoun (in English always in the objective case) to make a phrase limiting some other word.
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) A proposition ; an exposition ; a discourse .
